mapper.select: SELECT ard.ID_ AS id, ard.NAME_ AS name, ard.KEY_ AS key1, ard.CATEGORY_ AS category, ard.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, ard.DEPLOY_TIME_ AS deployTime FROM act_re_deployment ard

SELECT arp.ID_ AS id, arp.REV_ AS rev, arp.CATEGORY_ AS category, arp.NAME_ AS name, arp.KEY_ AS key1, arp.VERSION_ AS version, arp.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ AS deploymentId, arp.RESOURCE_NAME_ AS bpmnResource, arp.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ AS PngResource FROM act_re_procdef arp
